about_the_game:
This Paint the Town Red demo contains the full Biker Bar scenario level playable in single player with all modifiers available.

You can also explore the Beneath - Facility area, which is the pre-run hub area of the massive roguelike mode: Beneath.

Check out the full game on Steam for more Scenarios, Arena Challenges, the full Beneath mode, which are all playable in singleplayer or cooperative multiplayer, as well as thousands of player created levels and an intuitive Level Editor where you can create your own.

content_descriptors.notes: Paint the Town Red features depictions of cartoonishly over-the-top, stylised blood and gore when fighting the voxel-based enemies..

detailed_description:
This Paint the Town Red demo contains the full Biker Bar scenario level playable in single player with all modifiers available.

You can also explore the Beneath - Facility area, which is the pre-run hub area of the massive roguelike mode: Beneath.

Check out the full game on Steam for more Scenarios, Arena Challenges, the full Beneath mode, which are all playable in singleplayer or cooperative multiplayer, as well as thousands of player created levels and an intuitive Level Editor where you can create your own.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 12.04+/Equivalent or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz 64-bit CPU
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 Compatible GPU with 1024MB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: If you are on or around the min spec then you may need to run with Low graphics options and at a lower resolution.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 Compatible GPU with 1024MB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: If you are on or around the min spec then you may need to run with Low graphics options and at a lower resolution.

name: Paint the Town Red Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A demo of the game Paint the Town Red featuring the full Biker Bar level with modifiers and the Beneath Facility
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
